_header: John sayeth here in this gospel / Thing that we should like well
_description: Gospel, ‘Feria iva in vigilia Ascensionis’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IOn seiþ here in þis gospelÞing þat we schulde
                    lyke wel…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of al Monkynde hit is to sayGraunt vs lord to heuene þe
                    way. Amen.
